Package game.items.consumable

Class PowerStar

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.consumable.PowerStar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Consumable, Purchasable, Resettable
public class PowerStar
extends Item
implements Purchasable, Resettable, Consumable

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PowerStar()
    Constructor for the PowerStar class Setting the timeSpan to 10 (life span of item if left on ground) Registering the item to be reset.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void consume​(Actor actor)
    Method that provides buff to the actor and also removes actions/the item from actors inventory
    void consumeStar()
    Method that resets the timeSpan to the number of turns that the item buffs lasts according to the specification Sets consumed to true (Item has been consumed by the actor) to carry out the specific actions in the tick method.
    DropItemAction getDropAction​(Actor actor)
    Overriding the default drop action as a power star cannot be dropped according to Assignment Supplementary Videos, Episode 3.
    java.lang.String getLifeSpanString()
    Returns remaining life span of power star in inventory
    PickUpItemAction getPickUpAction​(Actor actor)
    The specialized pickup item action for this item, PowerStar.
    int getTimeSpan()
    Returns the current timeSpan of the Power Star item.
    int price()
    price method (a getter method to get the price of this item object) Used in PurchaseAction where it needs to get the prices of the purchasableItem
    void resetInstance()
    Implementation of resetInstance() for the Power Stars, to remove the buff from the actor without adding it back in the next turn.
    Item returnSelf()
    Returns itself as an item type (to avoid type casting)
    void tick​(Location currentLocation)
    Tick method (called every turn when item is on ground) Used to reduce the timeSpan by 1 and remove the item from the ground if not picked up by 10 turns
    void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
    Tick method (called every turn when item is in players inventory) Used to reduce the timeSpan by 1 and remove all buffs from the player and the item from the inventory after 10 turns Every turn that the item is in inventory and actor has not consumed it provides the latest consume action (new item count of this item in inventory for the menu)

  • Constructor Details

    • PowerStar

      public PowerStar()
      Constructor for the PowerStar class Setting the timeSpan to 10 (life span of item if left on ground) Registering the item to be reset.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation)
      Tick method (called every turn when item is on ground) Used to reduce the timeSpan by 1 and remove the item from the ground if not picked up by 10 turns
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Tick method (called every turn when item is in players inventory) Used to reduce the timeSpan by 1 and remove all buffs from the player and the item from the inventory after 10 turns Every turn that the item is in inventory and actor has not consumed it provides the latest consume action (new item count of this item in inventory for the menu)
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
      actor - The actor carrying this Item.

    • price

      public int price()
      price method (a getter method to get the price of this item object) Used in PurchaseAction where it needs to get the prices of the purchasableItem
      Specified by:
      price in interface Purchasable
      Returns:
      an integer representing the price/value of the item

    • getPickUpAction

      public PickUpItemAction getPickUpAction​(Actor actor)
      The specialized pickup item action for this item, PowerStar.
      Overrides:
      getPickUpAction in class Item
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      Returns:
      new PickUpConsumeAction that does pick up and consumption of the star when executed.

    • getDropAction

      public DropItemAction getDropAction​(Actor actor)
      Overriding the default drop action as a power star cannot be dropped according to Assignment Supplementary Videos, Episode 3. Drop only allowed for non-player actors.
      Overrides:
      getDropAction in class Item
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      Returns:
      null

    • getTimeSpan

      public int getTimeSpan()
      Returns the current timeSpan of the Power Star item. (If the item is on the ground, it is the remaining life span of the item before it disappears) (If the item is in the actors inventory, it is the remaining time span of the buff before it disappears)
      Returns:
      the current timeSpan of the Power Star item.

    • consumeStar

      public void consumeStar()
      Method that resets the timeSpan to the number of turns that the item buffs lasts according to the specification Sets consumed to true (Item has been consumed by the actor) to carry out the specific actions in the tick method. Removes the option to consume the item. Adds status REMOVED where when the item buff is over, the item has to be removed from the players inventory.

    • resetInstance

      public void resetInstance()
      Implementation of resetInstance() for the Power Stars, to remove the buff from the actor without adding it back in the next turn. Sets the timeSpan to -1 for all consumed Power Stars, therefore on next turn the tick method removes the INVINCIBLE capability and the item from inventory (if it has not been removed already)
      Specified by:
      resetInstance in interface Resettable

    • consume

      public void consume​(Actor actor)
      Method that provides buff to the actor and also removes actions/the item from actors inventory
      Specified by:
      consume in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor consuming the item

    • getLifeSpanString

      public java.lang.String getLifeSpanString()
      Returns remaining life span of power star in inventory
      Specified by:
      getLifeSpanString in interface Consumable
      Returns:
      String of the life span

    • returnSelf

      public Item returnSelf()
      Returns itself as an item type (to avoid type casting)
      Specified by:
      returnSelf in interface Consumable
      Returns:
      Item type of itself
